div.p: From Frederick Bailey to Joseph Hooker
QUOTED IN Clements from AJP, so original will be at Kew

I have taken for my guide in the arrangement your excellent work the Genera Plantarum
of which I have the 1 & 2 & first part of the 3rd vols. In this Baron Mueller is much displeased with me he wishing me to follow what he terms his arrangement - I told him I liked the Gen. PI
. as it was plain and that it was the same as used in all the Floras being published and I considered that to use any other arrangement would be unpardonable as it would lead to confusion
